com.informix.jdbc

Class IfxByteArrayInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.ByteArrayInputStream
        • com.informix.jdbc.IfxByteArrayInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class IfxByteArrayInputStream
extends java.io.ByteArrayInputStream
    JDBC 2.0 A IfxByteArrayInputStream is a subclass of ByteArrayInputStream. This class will overwrite ByteArrayInputStream's close method to delete the output stream member variable.
